title: Patch Notes
content: n. Fixed a potential crash when dragging items of clothing from a trade straight into your equipment slots. Fixed a potential crash when right-clicking an empty equipment slot. Fixed a potential crash when loading a modded savegame with those mods disabled. Fixed a crash when switching between keyboard and mouse and controller in Character Creation.
